title: iPad Mini 2
summary: The iPad Mini 2 (formerly marketed as the iPad mini with Retina display,[3] officially iPad mini 2 with Retina display[4]) is a tablet computer produced and marketed by Apple Inc. It has an almost identical design to the first-generation iPad Mini, but features internal revisions such as the addition of the A7 system-on-a-chip and 2,048 x 1,536 resolution Retina Display.[5] Internally, the second-generation iPad Mini has nearly the same hardware as its sibling device, the iPad Air. Apple released the second-generation iPad Mini in space gray and silver colors on November 12, 2013.
